document.full_text: thousands of syrians called for freedom at the funeral of eight protesters sunday, a witness said, after president bashar al-assad named a former agriculture minister to form a new government.
document.title: syria's assad names new pm, faces defiant suburb
lines_and_colors: thousands of syrians called for freedom at the funeral of eight protesters sunday, a witness said, after president bashar al-assad named a former agriculture minister to form a new government.
